ygData.msgSnippet: Oops.  Ah well, I was at work going from memory.  Just chalk that one up to Troll stupidity.  :) Cronik  Left Hand of Thule the Pain
ygData.messageBody:
Oops. Ah well, I was at work going from memory. Just chalk that one up to Troll stupidity. :)

Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>

Bertoxxulous

Gugbug
Troll Shadowknight of the 11th season
